title: Would it be cool if there is skin trading?
body:
Riot should add skin trading into league of legends. For example, to trade:
- Both players have to agree that they wouldn't want the skin back
- Both players must give a skin 
- The skin must be activated
And If a player want the skin back, they should ask the other player that they traded with to give back the skin to them, If not it's their problem not Riot's. Please add this it would be a cool idea and many people will like it.
